title: Willy Woo floats ‘dummies guide’ to evading the quantum Bitcoin threat
contentSnippet: Some critics argue the threat posed by quantum computers is overblown, including Strategy chairman Michael Saylor, who has once called it a marketing ploy to pump quantum-branded tokens.

title: Bitcoin’s $588B Range Masks Market Vulnerabilities: 10x Research
contentSnippet: Bitcoin has been trading in a range above $100,000 since June, with significant market activity despite a lack of clear direction.

title: Ethereum Spot Order Activity Hints at Institutional Re-Entry, Analysts Claim
contentSnippet: On-chain data shows Ethereum whales are accumulating, signaling a potential local bottom as the Fusaka upgrade nears.

title: Bitcoin Traders Eye Seasonal 'Santa Rally' as Fed Moves Spur Volatility Hopes
contentSnippet: Strategic accumulation and potential liquidity easing measures could breed a Santa rally, according to analysts.

title: Bitcoin chatter surges as price recovers, US govt shutdown nears end
contentSnippet: The Senate passed a bill on Monday to end the record US government shutdown, while Bitcoin has been trending on social media as it surged 6.7% past $106,000.

title: Senate Agriculture Leaders Push to Put Crypto Spot Trading Under CFTC Watch
contentSnippet: The bipartisan discussion draft mandates exchange oversight and wallet protections while deferring decisions on DeFi regulation.

title: ブロックチェーンゲーム「コインムスメ ドリームレース!」、12月26日にサービス終了
contentSnippet: ブロックチェーンゲーム「コインムスメ ドリームレース!」が12月26日にサービス終了。売上によるトークン買い支えモデルの継続が困難になったことや、外部要因への対応コストが影響。約2年半の運営に幕。MSMトークンはDEX上で存続予定。

title: DOGE Tests $0.18 Floor After Intraday Breakout Sparks Profit-Taking
contentSnippet: The move created a lower high formation that signals a potential short-term shift in momentum.

title: TeraWulf Q3 revenue up 87% as Bitcoin nearly doubles over the year
contentSnippet: TeraWulf reported the average price of Bitcoin during Q3 was $114,390, compared to only $61,023 for the same period last year.

title: XRP ETF Hopes Drive Ripple-Linked Token Bulls to Target $2.65
contentSnippet: The breakout attempt at $2.57 met resistance as profit-taking emerged, though buyers held firm above the $2.52-$2.53 zone to confirm short-term support.

title: 英中銀、「システム上重要な」ステーブルコイン規制案で意見募集　保有上限を設定
contentSnippet: イングランド銀行は、ポンド建てシステム上重要なステーブルコインの規制案を公表。個人に2万ポンド（約390万円）、企業に1000万ポンド（約19億5000万円）の一時的な保有上限を設定し、銀行預金の急速な流出リスクを管理する。

title: Gemini bets on ‘super app’ as stock sinks to record low on Q3 results
contentSnippet: Shares in Gemini slumped after the company reported losses in its third-quarter results, largely due to the costs associated with going public.

title: 今後の仮想通貨市場、レバレッジ崩壊後の回復見込みは？＝コインベース分析
contentSnippet: コインベースが10月清算イベント後の仮想通貨市場について最新の分析を発表。レバレッジが解消され今後数か月はゆるやかに上昇すると予想している。

title: Gemini Shares Drop in After-Hours Trading as First Earnings Since IPO Reveal Rising Costs
contentSnippet: It wasn't all bad news, with the exchange reporting its strongest user-acquisition quarter in years, powered by surging credit-card activity.

title: Uniswap Token Soars Amid Fee Switch Proposal to ‘Align Incentives’
contentSnippet: Uniswap’s token spike follows the protocol’s unveiling of a sweeping overhaul, including fee activation and a perpetual token burn to boost liquidity.

title: Asia Morning Briefing: Hong Kong’s FinTech Week Belonged to Stablecoins, Not CBDCs
contentSnippet: Once the future of digital money, central bank digital currencies barely featured this year as Hong Kong’s focus shifted to stablecoins and Brazil’s Drex pause showed how even early adopters are rethi

title: 金持ち父さん著者キヨサキ、ビットコイン・金・銀の価格予想を公開　「売らずに買い続ける」
contentSnippet: 『金持ち父さん貧乏父さん』著者のロバート・キヨサキ氏が2026年のビットコイン価格を25万ドルと予想した。金や銀にも強気の見通しを示し、米国の債務拡大を理由に実物資産への投資を推奨。

title: Jack Dorsey’s Square has just opened up 4M merchants to Bitcoin
contentSnippet: X users have already reported using the new Bitcoin payment feature at coffee shops across the United States.

title: ランブル、テザー支援でノーザンデータ買収へ　AI・HPC事業を強化
contentSnippet: 動画プラットフォームRumbleが、ステーブルコイン大手テザーの支援を受けてAI企業ノーザンデータを買収する。欧州最大級のGPU事業獲得でクラウド事業を強化する。

title: BitMine snapped up 34% more ETH last week as prices dipped
contentSnippet: BitMine’s massive ETH accumulation accelerated last week, adding 110,288 Ether to its $12.5 billion treasury as it targets 5% of the total supply.

title: 仮想通貨取引所ジェミニ、IPO後初の決算発表　予想超える売上増も損失拡大
contentSnippet: ウィンクルボス兄弟創業のジェミニが株式上場後初の四半期決算を発表し、1株当たり6.67ドルの損失を計上した。売上高は5,060万ドルで前年比2倍に増加したが、上場関連費用が重荷となった。

title: Pontaポイントをステーブルコインに　KDDIが年内にも新サービス提供へ＝日経
contentSnippet: KDDIは年内にも、共通ポイントPontaをステーブルコインに替えて決済や送金に利用できるようにすることがわかった。ブロックチェーン上の金融サービスでも活用できるようにする。

title: Bitdeer Stock Tumbles as Bitcoin Miner Posts Third Quarter Net Loss
contentSnippet: Bitdeer's Nasdaq-listed stock fell sharply on Monday amid a broader sector sell-off in crypto miners, as they embrace a pivot to AI.

title: Biopharma eyes $100M for crypto treasury to back cancer treatment
contentSnippet: Propanc Biopharma said it will build a crypto treasury after securing up to $100 million from Hexstone Capital to further its potential cancer treatment and reignite investor interest.

title: AI’s Progress Now Depends on ‘World Models’ That Grasp Physical Reality
contentSnippet: A new report warns that language models can go only so far, and that future progress depends on AI that can model the physical world.

title: Uniswap token jumps 38% after fee switch, burn proposal hits the table
contentSnippet: The Uniswap token rose over 38% after the introduction of a protocol fee switch and burning mechanism that could strengthen UNI.

title: ブロック社のスクエア、400万店舗でビットコイン決済開始
contentSnippet: ジャック・ドーシー率いるブロック社が、スクエアで全世界400万店舗のビットコイン決済を可能にした。Square Bitcoinは2027年まで手数料無料で、ライトニングネットワークによる即時決済を提供。

title: Senate committee unveils crypto market structure bill draft
contentSnippet: The Senate Agriculture Committee has released a draft bill outlining the proposed regulatory jurisdiction of the country’s two main financial market regulators.

title: BNY Sees Stablecoins, Tokenized Cash Hitting $3.6T by 2030 Amid Institutional Adoption
contentSnippet: Blockchains won't replace the traditional rails but will be integrated and work in tandem, the bank said in the report.

title: 米上院農業委員会が仮想通貨規制法案の草案公開、CFTCに新たな権限付与へ
contentSnippet: 米上院農業委員会が仮想通貨規制法案の草案を公開し、CFTCにデジタル・コモディティの規制権限を付与する内容を明らかにした。多くの部分が両党間の交渉中で未解決となっている。

title: McDonald's Exec Stirs Up Bitcoin Crowd With McRib Return
contentSnippet: Bitcoin (sometimes) pumps when the McRib returns. Will this sweet, slathered meat help BTC repeat the feat?

title: U.S. Clears Way for Crypto ETPs to Get Into Yield Without Triggering Tax Problems
contentSnippet: The Internal Revenue Service issued new guidance that Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said offers a "clear path" to stake digital assets for trusts.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Senate Ag Releases Long-Awaited Version of Crypto Market Structure Legislation
contentSnippet: The bill brings Congress a step closer to firmly defining how the CFTC and SEC can oversee crypto.

title: 仮想通貨投資商品、先週は約1800億円の資金が純流出　CoinSharesが要因を分析
contentSnippet: CoinSharesは、ETFなどの仮想通貨投資商品全体への先週における資金フローは約1,800億円の純流出だったと報告。ビットコインとイーサリアムの商品が流出を主導した。

title: Bitcoin Miner TeraWulf Shares Drop in After Hours Trading, Despite 87% Revenue Gain
contentSnippet: TeraWulf attributed the increase to Bitcoin's rising price and expanded mining capacity, among other reasons.

title: Ethereum, Solana ETFs Get Green Light for Staking via US Treasury, IRS Crypto Fund Guidance
contentSnippet: The IRS and Treasury said trusts can now generate staking rewards for crypto ETF investors without fear of tax or regulatory repercussions.

title: Bitcoin Holds Above $105K as Traders Eye Shutdown Deal, Liquidity Boost
contentSnippet: Ending the government shutdown may trigger a $150-$200 billion liquidity injection, but a continuation could derail long-term crypto regulation, Arca's research head said.

title: Argentina's Libra Meme Coin Case Takes a Turn With Frozen Funds, Payments Probe: Report
contentSnippet: The funds of Hayden Davis and two alleged intermediaries were frozen by a judge due to connections to the Libra meme coin promoted by Argentine President Javier Milei.

title: Uniswap Proposes Sweeping ‘UNIfication’ With UNI Burn and Protocol Fee Overhaul
contentSnippet: The proposal, called “UNIfication,” would activate protocol fees, burn millions of UNI tokens and consolidate the project’s key teams under a single strategy.
